title: 全聯10元便當之亂

panels.scene_description: A person excitedly stares at their phone, showing the 全聯 (PX Mart) app. The app displays a banner for the 10-dollar bento box promotion with a 排骨便當 (pork rib bento) image.
panels.dialogue: Me: (Thinking) 10-dollar bento?! That's cheaper than instant noodles! Time to feast!
panels.narrative_function: Introduces the scenario and the protagonist's motivation.
panels.english_prompt: cartoon style, 4-panel comic, clear characters, panel showing a person excitedly looking at a phone displaying a 全聯 app banner with a 10-dollar bento promotion

panels.scene_description: The same person frantically taps their phone screen, with error messages popping up on the 全聯 app. Sweat is dripping down their face.
panels.dialogue: System: ERROR! ERROR! Server overloaded. Please try again later. Me: Nooo! My precious bento!
panels.narrative_function: Develops the conflict: the app crashes due to high demand.
panels.english_prompt: cartoon style, 4-panel comic, clear characters, panel showing a person frantically tapping their phone with error messages popping up on the 全聯 app

panels.scene_description: The person is now sitting dejectedly in front of their phone, staring blankly. The app now shows a message: "Sold Out!" Another user is gleefully holding up a bento box in the background.
panels.dialogue: Me: (Muttering) I knew I should've set an alarm... and written a bot... and bribed the server admin...
panels.narrative_function: Shows the turning point: the bento boxes are sold out.
panels.english_prompt: cartoon style, 4-panel comic, clear characters, panel showing a dejected person staring at their phone with a 'Sold Out!' message, another person gleefully holding up a bento in the background

panels.scene_description: The person is now happily eating instant noodles, but glaring at a 全聯 delivery truck driving by in the background. A small sign on the truck reads: "全聯小時達: 買不到10元便當？沒關係，還有泡麵！(Can't get the 10-dollar bento? No worries, we have instant noodles!)"
panels.dialogue: Me: (Grumbling while eating noodles) At least it's edible... Thanks, 全聯, for the 'discount' on my disappointment.
panels.narrative_function: Provides a humorous conclusion: the person resorts to instant noodles, highlighting the irony.
panels.english_prompt: cartoon style, 4-panel comic, clear characters, panel showing a person happily eating instant noodles but glaring at a 全聯 delivery truck with a sign: 'Can't get the 10-dollar bento? No worries, we have instant noodles!'

overall_style: Humorous and satirical, suitable for adults.
